channel.title: Food eating problem :S

item.title: Food eating problem :S
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Whenever i eat any food, manta, shark etc… and i’m on a Mod (playerRights 1) or Admin/Owner (playerRights 2), it works… heals and disappears, and says i eat it. Like it’s meant too.

However, if i’m on a character with playerRights 0, my food doesnt work. I can eat any type of food, it does nothing. No heal, disappear, emote, nothing.

What the hell?

I really need help!! this basically means people can’t play my server unless i make everyone a mod!!

Example:

public boolean buryBones(int fromSlot) { if (playerItemsN[fromSlot]!=1 || playerItems[fromSlot] < 1) { return false; } int buryItem = playerItems[fromSlot]; int buryXP = 0; int addHerb = 0; int myHP = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; if ((buryItem-1) == 379) { if(myHP <= 99) { heal = 12; hitDiff = -heal; myHP += heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You eat the lobster, it heals 12 hitpoints."); setAnimation(829); }

This piece of code doesn’t seem to initialise at all… I’ve tested it and on a non-ranked character, it doesn’t initialise…

There’s also:

} else if (healing[1] > 0) { setAnimation(829); healing[0] = 1; healing[4] = Item; healing(); } return true;

That’s the animation of eating that works if a ranked player eats… but where does that go to activate the food?? lol

Please help if you can, sorry if this is complicated :S

Read full topic
